title: Is this a Bodoni?
content:
Hi guys.

MadeThought’s work for Established & Sons use what i think it’s a Bodoni. But is this a Bodoni, and if so version or kind is it? I have just checked up against the different versions of Bodoni Black or Poster that i have on my computer. But no ones look as nice and elegant as this one.

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Billede 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090605100616/http:/typophile.com/files/Billede%201_2.png) | 711.3 KB |
author: steeze

comments.content:
I think it looks like [Didoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20090605100616/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/didoni/).

- Mike Yanega
Haha. Yea maybe that’s why i can’t seem to find it... I have only Bodoni and Didot in my system, damn :D
